title: HMSI sets up dedicated unit for electric 2Ws in K'taka; to roll out 10L units per year by 2030
description: "Electric mobility is growing in India and our aim is to build the country's best EV business structure. To fulfil our EV business requirements we are coming up with a dedicated factory in Narsapura," Honda Motorcycle &Scooter India (HMSI) Managing Director, President and CEO Atsushi Ogata told reporters here.
